response.message: Is the surprise guest Wil Wheaton?
Stack Overflow on the tubes? Uh-oh.

"we will remember to buy before this podcast is published"

That line was brilliant :) .

Hopefully, the project will work. Can't wait. Good luck

Even though I let Joel have a big head start, I managed to collect all the snowflakes before he did.  (And I'm not sure he ever did, now that I think about it.)

I hope the users of Politics.SE listen to Joel's advice here.  There's not much need for _another_ site where people can type political messages at each other.  It's more or less the solution that Christianity.SE arrived at.

Nice _Dinosaurs_ call-out, by the way.  I remember it being really funny.  (Oddly, the episode I watched on Netflix wasn't as hilarious as I remember.  What happened?!?)
Yeah, will write & send the message to u..
Don't call them "pivot questions". Call them "Floor cat questions".
